articles.title: Alopecia: Woman describes how she could not look in the mirror - BBC.com
articles.description: Poppie Davies wore a wig and talked about how isolated she felt with the condition.
articles.content:
By Gemma Dunstan, BBC Wales Live 
Poppie Davies says she now wants to help others with alopecia
When Poppie Davies's hairdresser noticed a bald patch when she was just 16, it ended with her unable … [+4852 chars]
